body: Is it normal to think about dropping out of grad school every day?
I think so, that was my experience too!!!
Trust me, it's worth it though, and you're SO close to the end. You got this!!!
My professor legit did a cartwheel in class last night, I don't even know what this is anymore.
Like bro does a cartwheel and then assigns a massive project for us to make an entire advertising campaign but we have to pretend our target audience is ants like ???
Aw that sounds so fun. Imagine doing little research experiments and UI/UX testing on little ants.
Should we pitch a game for ants to the company? They are really an untapped market.
I think we could get Laura into it. And I doubt the devs would even ask any questions.
Imagine having to tell Tom we're making a game for ants with a straight face and hand him over comps and requirements?
I think he'd quit on the spot.
Let me know when you finish this ant assignment, I'm actually super curious what you come up with!!!
